name: Sudoku by Nikoli
synopsis: With the Nikoli puzzle series, you can enjoy high-quality sudoku puzzles, created by Nikoli, who gave the world-famous puzzle its name. The Nintendo 3DS system makes this game simple and easy to play. Sudoku by Nikoli contains 50 sudoku puzzles. Sudoku is a puzzle game in which you must place numbers from 1-9 into a 9x9 grid that is also divided into horizontal and vertical lines and 3x3 squares. When the puzzle is finished, each line and square will contain the numbers 1-9. With everything from simple puzzles to super-difficult ones, this game is popular with a wide range of players, from beginners to veterans. To provide long-term enjoyment, both a Stage Clear and a Random mode are included. In Stage Clear mode, you progress by clearing puzzles one by one and in Random mode puzzles are generated at random. Please enjoy this high-quality sudoku game.
